SetShd.name: SetShd
SetShd.description: Specify the shading applied to the contents of the table cell.

params.name: sType
params.description: The shading type which will be applied to the contents of the current table cell.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

params.name: isAuto
params.description: The true value will disable table cell contents shading.

SetCellMarginBottom.name: SetCellMarginBottom
SetCellMarginBottom.description:
Specify the amount of space which will be left between the bottom extent of the cell contents and the border
of a specific table cell within a table.

params.name: nValue
params.description:
The value for the amount of space below the bottom extent of the cell measured in twentieths
of a point (1/1440 of an inch). If this value is null, then default table cell bottom margin will be used, otherwise
the table cell bottom margin will be overridden with the specified value for the current cell.

SetCellMarginLeft.name: SetCellMarginLeft
SetCellMarginLeft.description:
Specify the amount of space which will be left between the left extent of the cell contents and
the border of a specific table cell within a table.

params.name: nValue
params.description:
The value for the amount of space to the left extent of the cell measured in twentieths
of a point (1/1440 of an inch). If this value is null<c/ode>, then default table cell left margin will be used, otherwise
the table cell left margin will be overridden with the specified value for the current cell.

SetCellMarginRight.name: SetCellMarginRight
SetCellMarginRight.description: Specify the amount of space which will be left between the right extent of the cell contents and the border of a specific table cell within a table.

params.name: nValue
params.description:
The value for the amount of space to the right extent of the cell measured in twentieths
of a point (1/1440 of an inch). If this value is null, then default table cell right margin will be used, otherwise
the table cell right margin will be overridden with the specified value for the current cell.

SetCellMarginTop.name: SetCellMarginTop
SetCellMarginTop.description:
Specify the amount of space which will be left between the upper extent of the cell contents
and the border of a specific table cell within a table.

params.name: nValue
params.description:
The value for the amount of space above the upper extent of the cell measured in twentieths
of a point (1/1440 of an inch). If this value is null, then default table cell top margin will be used, otherwise
the table cell top margin will be overridden with the specified value for the current cell.

SetCellBorderBottom.name: SetCellBorderBottom
SetCellBorderBottom.description: Set the border which will be displayed at the bottom of the current table cell.

params.name: sType
params.description: The cell bottom border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current cell bottom border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset in the bottom part of the table cell measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetCellBorderLeft.name: SetCellBorderLeft
SetCellBorderLeft.description: Set the border which will be displayed to the left of the current table cell.

params.name: sType
params.description: The cell left border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current cell left border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset in the left part of the table cell measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetCellBorderRight.name: SetCellBorderRight
SetCellBorderRight.description: Set the border which will be displayed to the right of the current table cell.

params.name: sType
params.description: The cell right border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current cell right border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset in the right part of the table cell measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetCellBorderTop.name: SetCellBorderTop
SetCellBorderTop.description: Set the border which will be displayed at the top of the current table cell.

params.name: sType
params.description: The cell top border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current cell top border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset in the top part of the table cell measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetWidth.name: SetWidth
SetWidth.description: Set the preferred width for the current table cell.

params.name: sType
params.description: Type of the width value from one of the available width values types.

params.name: nValue
params.description: The table cell width value measured in positive integers.

SetVerticalAlign.name: SetVerticalAlign
SetVerticalAlign.description: Specify the vertical alignment for text contents within the current table cell.

params.name: sType
params.description: The available types of the vertical alignment for the text contents of the current table cell.

SetTextDirection.name: SetTextDirection
SetTextDirection.description: Specify the direction of the text flow for this table cell.

params.name: sType
params.description:
The available types of the text direction in the table cell: "lrtb"

  • text direction left-to-right moving from top to bottom, "tbrl" - text direction top-to-bottom moving from right
    to left, "btlr" - text direction bottom-to-top moving from left to right.

SetNoWrap.name: SetNoWrap
SetNoWrap.description:
Specify how this table cell is laid out when the parent table is displayed in a document. This setting
only affects the behavior of the cell when the {@link ApiTablePr#SetTableLayout} table layout for this table is set to use the "autofit" algorithm.

params.name: isNoWrap
params.description: The true value will enable the SetNoWrap method use.

comment:
/**
	 * Class representing a table cell proprties.
	 * @constructor
	 */
